short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to add our custom words to a list and have them, automatically, highlighted as you browse the Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The source code for this extension is available at https://github.com/rafaelcpalmeida/Word-Highlighter
